verses.verse: Now in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>assembled<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and with <S%H8242>sackcloths,<s%> and <S%H127>earth<s%> on them.

And the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1121>strangers,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H3034>confessed<s%> their <S%H2403>sins,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And they <S%H6965>stood<s%> up in their <S%H5977>place,<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> one <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of the <S%H3117>day;<s%> and another <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part they <S%H3034>confessed,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H6965>stood<s%> up on the <S%H4608>stairs,<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> <S%H1137>Bunni,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> and <S%H3662>Chenani,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> <S%H2813>Hashabniah,<s%> <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H1940>Hodijah,<s%> <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> and <S%H6611>Pethahiah,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Stand<s%> up and <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever:<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be your <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

You, even you, are <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> you have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>host,<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> things that are <S%H5921>therein,<s%> the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is therein, and you <S%H2421>preserve<s%> them <S%H3605>all;<s%> and the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7812>worships<s%> you.

You are the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> did <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> and <S%H7760>gave<s%> him the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham;<s%>

And <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it, I say, to his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and have <S%H6965>performed<s%> your <S%H1697>words;<s%> for you are <S%H6662>righteous:<s%>
And did <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%>

And <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of his <S%H776>land:<s%> for you <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they dealt <S%H2102>proudly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them. So did you <S%H6213>get<s%> you a <S%H8034>name,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And you did <S%H1234>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, so that they <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H8432>through<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land; and their <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> you <S%H7993>threw<s%> into the <S%H4688>deeps,<s%> as a <S%H68>stone<s%> into the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Moreover you <S%H5148>led<s%> them in the <S%H3119>day<s%> by a <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar;<s%> and in the <S%H3915>night<s%> by a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> to give them <S%H216>light<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

You <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> also on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4687>commandments:<s%>

And <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to them your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H4687>precepts,<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8451>laws,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> your <S%H5650>servant:<s%>

And <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for their <S%H7457>hunger,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for them out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and <S%H559>promised<s%> them that they should <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you had <S%H5375>sworn<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them.
But they and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> dealt <S%H2102>proudly,<s%> and <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>necks,<s%> and <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

And <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>obey,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> were <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of your <S%H6381>wonders<s%> that you <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> them; but <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>necks,<s%> and in their <S%H4805>rebellion<s%> <S%H5414>appointed<s%> a <S%H7218>captain<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H5659>bondage:<s%> but you are a <S%H433>God<s%> ready to <S%H5547>pardon,<s%> <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsook<s%> them not.

<S%H637>Yes,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they had <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is your <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and had <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5007>provocations;<s%>

Yet you in your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> them not in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> not from them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> neither the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to show them <S%H216>light,<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

You <S%H5414>gave<s%> also your <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H7919>instruct<s%> them, and <S%H4513>withheld<s%> not your <S%H4478>manna<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%> for their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

Yes, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> did you <S%H3557>sustain<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> so that they <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> their <S%H8008>clothes<s%> waxed not <S%H1086>old,<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H1216>swelled<s%> not.

Moreover you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> and <S%H5971>nations,<s%> and did <S%H2505>divide<s%> them into <S%H6285>corners:<s%> so they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> also <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> you as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> concerning <S%H834>which<s%> you had <S%H559>promised<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that they should <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

So the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and you <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> with their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that they might <S%H6213>do<s%> with them as they would.

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H1219>strong<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and a <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2898>goods,<s%> <S%H953>wells<s%> <S%H2672>dig,<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and olive <S%H2132>groves,<s%> and <S%H3978>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance:<s%> so they did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and were <S%H7646>filled,<s%> and <S%H8080>became<s%> <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and <S%H5727>delighted<s%> themselves in your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness.<s%>

Nevertheless they were <S%H4784>disobedient,<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against you, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> their <S%H1458>backs,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them to <S%H7725>turn<s%> them to you, and they <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5007>provocations.<s%>

Therefore you <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> who <S%H6887>vexed<s%> them: and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to you, you <S%H8085>heard<s%> them from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and according to your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3467>saviors,<s%> who <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>

But after they had <S%H5117>rest,<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: therefore <S%H5800>left<s%> you them in the <S%H3027>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> so that they had the <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over them: yet when they <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried<s%> to you, you <S%H8085>heard<s%> them from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> did you <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them according to your <S%H7356>mercies;<s%>

And <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them, that you might <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>again<s%> to your <S%H8451>law:<s%> yet they dealt <S%H2102>proudly,<s%> and <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> but <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>(which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in them;) and <S%H5414>withdrew<s%> <S%H5437><s%> the <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H7185>hardened<s%> their <S%H6203>neck,<s%> and would not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Yet <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> did you <S%H4900>forbear<s%> them, and <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them by your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in your <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> yet would they not give <S%H238>ear:<s%> therefore <S%H5414>gave<s%> you them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands.<s%>

Nevertheless for your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7356>mercies'<s%> sake you did not utterly <S%H3615>consume<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> them; for you are a <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, our <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> let not <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>trouble<s%> <S%H4591>seem<s%> <S%H4591>little<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, that has <S%H4672>come<s%> on us, on our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> on our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and on our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and on our <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and on our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> since the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
However, you are <S%H6662>just<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H935>brought<s%> on us; for you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H571>right,<s%> but we have done <S%H7561>wickedly:<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> have our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> your <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7181>listened<s%> to your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and your <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you did <S%H5749>testify<s%> against them.

For they have not <S%H5647>served<s%> you in their <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and in your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> that you <S%H5414>gave<s%> them, and in the <S%H7342>large<s%> and <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> they from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H4611>works.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we are <S%H5650>servants<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and for the <S%H776>land<s%> that you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof and the <S%H2898>good<s%> thereof, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are <S%H5650>servants<s%> in it:

And it <S%H7235>yields<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us because of our <S%H2403>sins:<s%> also they have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> our <S%H1472>bodies,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> our <S%H929>cattle,<s%> at their <S%H7522>pleasure,<s%> and we are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

And because of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> we <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H548>sure<s%> covenant, and <S%H3789>write<s%> it; and our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H2856>seal<s%> to it.
